desc: Opens the settings editor to modify the settings of the currently active profile in VS Code.
Displays the contents of the selected user profile in VS Code.
Exports the currently active profile settings and extensions into a profile file.
Imports a user profile including settings, extensions, and keyboard shortcuts from a file.
Creates a new profile from the current configuration settings in VS Code.
Creates a new user profile in Visual Studio Code, allowing for customized settings and extensions separate from other profiles.
Deletes a user profile from Visual Studio Code.
Switches to a different user profile in Visual Studio Code, allowing the user to change settings, extensions, and setup configurations.
